p: The selected measuring interval is 2 hours in day, evening and night. Daytime is from 7am to 6pm where (D1) from 7–9 am, (D2) from 11 am-1 pm and (D3) from 3–5 pm. In evening time (E1) is from 7pm to 9 pm and at nighttime where (N1) from 11 pm- 1 am and (N2) from 3 - 5am. The readings are taken every 15 minutes using UT 353 digital sound meter device shown in Fig 6 giving 8 readings at each interval for each time of the day at each selected station. In all cases, the measuring device was placed at height 100 cm from sidewalk floor.
